metadata.name: Signal Lost
metadata.description:
Our lives depend on screens and the windows of the Soul are no longer windows.

What your Soul tells you?  

Florida Screenman woke up one day and lost the signal. The best thing to do when you loose the signal is not moving.  Eventually, the signal comes back. 

"Signal Lost" 
UHD Microfilm  
Duration: 24 sec  
Starring Luis Fernando Courtney as "Florida Screenman" 
Original Music by Sir Lemat 
Directed by Cryptofangs 
Guadalajara, MÃ©xico 
March 2023



*Florida Screenman appeared for the first time in Hitch Switchers Vol. 2 "Mythical Media" group show curated by Ina Vare on Nifty Gateway.
